content: उत्पद् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be born or produced, arise, originate, spring up; उत्पत्स्यतेऽस्ति मम कोपि समानधर्मा <ls>Māl. 1. 6</ls>; वायोः ज्योतिरुत्पद्यते <ls>Ms. 1. 77.</ls> {@--2@} To occur, happen; उदपादि चास्य मनसि <ls>K. 132</ls> it occurred to his mind; युद्धमुत्पत्स्यते महत् <ls>Mb.</ls>; उत्पन्नावसरमर्थित्वं <ls>M. 3</ls> for which an occasion has presented itself; <ls>Ms. 5. 48.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To produce, beget, cause, effect, bring about, prepare; वस्त्राणि सदैवोत्पादयति <ls>Pt. 2</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 63</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">2. 147</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 60</ls>; so दुःखं, दोषं, भयं, शंकां &c. {@--2@} To bring forward.
